BooksLoader Class Reference

Load / Save book data from a CSV file in the local directory. More...

#include <BooksLoader.h>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 BooksLoader ()
 Default Constructor
.

Static Public Member Functions

static bool LoadLibraryBooks (bool debugMode, const char *inputFileName, vector< BookType > &books)
 Load a list of books from a text file.
Returns a vector of BookType objects.
static bool SaveLibraryBooks (bool debugMode, const char *outputFileName, vector< BookType > &books)
 Save a list of books to a text file.
Accepts a vector of BookType objects.

Detailed Description

To minimise coupling, this class does not use the BST classes which will eventually store our book records. Instead, data is inserted to an STL vector.
